definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Reconfigurable manufacturing system (RcMS) is the optimum realization of the reconfigurable manufacturing paradigm.
sentences.chinese: 实现这一哲理的制造系统是可重构制造系统。

sentences.english: I assumed I was the one doing all the teaching.
sentences.chinese: 我一直认为我是那个教给他人生哲理的人。

sentences.english: You are not philosopher enough to solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 你没有足够哲理的思考力去解答这个问题。

sentences.english: History is the most philosophical textbook.
sentences.chinese: 历史是最富哲理的教科书。

sentences.english: Chopsticks, shape slimming light, simple and natural, flat in see Qiao, Shen Yun philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 筷子，形纤体轻，简约天然，平中见巧，深蕴哲理。

sentences.english: One of the most interesting of the alchemical texts is the Rosarium philosophorum.
sentences.chinese: 有一段甚为有趣的炼金术文本是蔷薇哲理。

sentences.english: But a broader and more generous, certainly more philosophical, view is held by those scientists who claim .
sentences.chinese: 有些科学家的观点更开阔，更富有普遍性和哲理性。

sentences.english: Honoré de Balzac was a French novelist and playwright.
sentences.chinese: 是巴尔扎克发表的第一部长篇哲理小说。

sentences.english: It is that Chinese and Western culture exchange burns, crystal being philosophic theory at all time.
sentences.chinese: 它是中西文化的交流点，是古今哲理的结晶。

sentences.english: If you are not burned to ashes, you will then be able to philosophize lyrically.
sentences.chinese: 如果你未被烧为灰烬，你将能够激情澎湃的阐明哲理。

sentences.english: Would you tell us your philosophy about living as an actor?
sentences.chinese: 你能告诉我们你作为演员的生活哲理吗？

sentences.english: Such as Hamlet's famous soliloquy, full of philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 如哈姆雷特的著名独白，富有哲理性。

sentences.english: This is philosophical, as a lot of this physics should be.
sentences.chinese: 这就是哲理，就是许多诸如此类的物理应该遵循的。

sentences.english: "Masses interest does not have bagatelle " the philosophic theory sex that this one axiom has strong shock force and profundity.
sentences.chinese: 这一至理名言具有强烈的震撼力和深刻的哲理性。

sentences.english: There is close contact between Chinese landscape poems and the Buddhistic philosophic theory.
sentences.chinese: 中国山水诗歌的产生和发展与佛教哲理有着不解之缘。

sentences.english: I am quite content with philosophic contemplation.
sentences.chinese: 我非常满足于哲理性的冥想。

definition: (idiom) thought-provoking/to give one food for thought
